name: Incognity: A rover story
description:
Incognity is a survival-adventure game created in three months for the SNESDEV game jam in 2021.

You play as a rover on a strange asteroid. Gathering resources, you can unlock improved tech, design better rovers, and reach distant areas. The native inhabitants aren't very happy about it, though.

 

The game targets NTSC SNES.

Music by Sean Kinsey. External art from opengameart and elsewhere (no license mention means PD):

  • Tatermand, cc-by-sa
  • Stars! Nova, cc-by-sa
  • Calciumtrice, cc-by
  • Lluc Entertainment, cc-by
  • JoesAlotofthings, cc-by
  • Mototsume, custom by
  • Wenrexa
  • Patvanmackelberg
  • Luminous Dragon Games
  • Nido
  • Para
  • Screamingbrain
